summary.description:
data integration and visualization platform that provides evidence about the association of known and potential drug targets with diseases.
identification and prioritization of biological targets for follow-up.
integrated genome-wide data from a broad range of data sources: evidence from genetics, genomics, transcriptomics, drugs, animal models and scientific literature to score and rank target-disease associations for drug target identification.
either a target-centric workflow to identify diseases that may be associated with a specific target, or a disease-centric workflow to identify targets that may be associated with a specific disease.
summary.name: Open Targets
